title: Web researcher needed for new successful start up.
snippet:
Summary
  Aera XY is recruiting part time researchers for our new research platform pilot. The platform, named Workbot is built on top of the Slack communication tool for companies. 
  The pilot will last two weeks starting on October 17th and ending on October 31st. During the pilot researchers can claim as many or as little research tasks the want. Each research task should take 8 hours on average and the output documents must use the Aera XY templates. Each completed research task earns $25.

Requirements  
Native/bilingual proficiency in English
Critical thinking and the ability to extract and synthesise information information in a concise, coherent manner. 
Proficient in using Google Spreadsheets/Slides/Doc’s
Have a Slack account
Install the Slack mobile app and have notifications enabled
Install Workbot from getworkbot.com
Quick responses 
Be available a minimum of 16h per week.
Have a PayPal account

Process 
After preselection of candidates they will be subjected to a quality test by doing research on a test task. If the quality of their research is similar or better than our reference they will be given the Slack and Workbot installation details.
